Quote.Author: Walt Whitman
Quote.QuoteValue: The art of art, the glory of expression and the sunshine of the light of letters, is simplicity

Quote.Author: Walt Whitman
Quote.QuoteValue: I see great things in baseball. It's our game - the American game

Quote.Author: Walt Whitman
Quote.QuoteValue: Be curious, not judgmental

Quote.Author: Warren Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago

Quote.Author: Warren Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: Rule No.1: Never lose money. Rule No.2: Never forget rule No.1

Quote.Author: Warren Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: Price is what you pay. Value is what you get

Quote.Author: Warren Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing

Quote.Author: Warren Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: In the business world, the rearview mirror is always clearer than the windshield

Quote.Author: Warren Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: Predicting rain doesn't count. Building arks does

Quote.Author: Warren Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: Chains of habit are too light to be felt until they are too heavy to be broken

Quote.Author: Warren Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: I always knew I was going to be rich. I don't think I ever doubted it for a minute

Quote.Author: Warren Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: Only when the tide goes out do you discover who's been swimming naked

Quote.Author: Warren Buffett
Quote.QuoteValue: Time is the friend of the wonderful company, the enemy of the mediocre

Quote.Author: Waylon Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: Honesty is something you can't wear out

Quote.Author: Waylon Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: So I'm not very popular here with those inside the system, as you might guess. I never wanted to be

Quote.Author: Waylon Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't ever try and be like anybody else and don't be afraid to take risks

Quote.Author: Waylon Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: I may be crazy, but it keeps me from going insane

Quote.Author: Waylon Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: But you know, the system almost destroyed itself while it was goin' on trying to destroy us

Quote.Author: Waylon Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: Cuz I was never pretty anyway and never cared anything about that

Quote.Author: Waylon Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: Finally, my manager negotiated a deal where I got to produce my own records

Quote.Author: Waylon Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't aim at anything except good music

Quote.Author: Waylon Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: I never have any problem getting enthusiastic with a good song and a good band

Quote.Author: Waylon Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I feel sorry for the young artists

Quote.Author: Wayne Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours

Quote.Author: Wayne Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice

Quote.Author: Wayne Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Self-worth comes from one thing - thinking that you are worthy

Quote.Author: Wayne Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one

Quote.Author: Wayne Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: The highest form of ignorance is when you reject something you don't know anything about

Quote.Author: Wayne Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot always control what goes on outside. But you can always control what goes on inside

Quote.Author: Wayne Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Relationships based on obligation lack dignity

Quote.Author: Wayne Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life

Quote.Author: Wayne Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Conflict cannot survive without your participation

Quote.Author: Wayne Dyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Transformation literally means going beyond your form

Quote.Author: Will Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is a progressive discovery of our own ignorance

Quote.Author: Will Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit

Quote.Author: Will Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: Our knowledge is a receding mirage in an expanding desert of ignorance

Quote.Author: Will Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: Nature has never read the Declaration of Independence. It continues to make us unequal

Quote.Author: Will Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: Moral codes adjust themselves to environmental conditions

Quote.Author: Will Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: Inquiry is fatal to certainty

Quote.Author: Will Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: To say nothing, especially when speaking, is half the art of diplomacy

Quote.Author: Will Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: The family is the nucleus of civilization

Quote.Author: Will Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: Knowledge is the eye of desire and can become the pilot of the soul

Quote.Author: Will Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: Woe to him who teaches men faster than they can learn

Quote.Author: Will Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything is funny, as long as it's happening to somebody else

Quote.Author: Will Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: A fool and his money are soon elected

Quote.Author: Will Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a member of any organized political party. I am a Democrat

Quote.Author: Will Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: Good judgment comes from experience, and a lot of that comes from bad judgment

Quote.Author: Will Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't make jokes. I just watch the government and report the facts

Quote.Author: Will Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: People's minds are changed through observation and not through argument

Quote.Author: Will Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: Never let yesterday use up too much of today

Quote.Author: Will Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: Do the best you can, and don't take life too serious

Quote.Author: Will Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: Make crime pay. Become a lawyer

Quote.Author: Will Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: We will never have true civilization until we have learned to recognize the rights of others

Quote.Author: William Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: I am in you and you in me, mutual in divine love

Quote.Author: William Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: Think in the morning. Act in the noon. Eat in the evening. Sleep in the night

Quote.Author: William Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: Great things are done when men and mountains meet

Quote.Author: William Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings

Quote.Author: William Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: Art is the tree of life. Science is the tree of death

Quote.Author: William Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend

Quote.Author: William Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: The road of excess leads to the palace of wisdom

Quote.Author: William Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: The bird a nest, the spider a web, man friendship

Quote.Author: William Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: The man who never alters his opinions is like standing water, and breeds reptiles of the mind

Quote.Author: William Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: The weak in courage is strong in cunning

Quote.Author: William James
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another

Quote.Author: William James
Quote.QuoteValue: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does

Quote.Author: William James
Quote.QuoteValue: Pessimism leads to weakness, optimism to power

Quote.Author: William James
Quote.QuoteValue: The deepest principle in human nature is the craving to be appreciated

Quote.Author: William James
Quote.QuoteValue: Acceptance of what has happened is the first step to overcoming the consequences of any misfortune

Quote.Author: William James
Quote.QuoteValue: There is but one cause of human failure. And that is man's lack of faith in his true Self

Quote.Author: William James
Quote.QuoteValue: Begin to be now what you will be hereafter

Quote.Author: William James
Quote.QuoteValue: Belief creates the actual fact

Quote.Author: William James
Quote.QuoteValue: If you care enough for a result, you will most certainly attain it

Quote.Author: William James
Quote.QuoteValue: A great many people think they are thinking when they are merely rearranging their prejudices

Quote.Author: Woody Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is full of misery, loneliness, and suffering - and it's all over much too soon

Quote.Author: Woody Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: I failed to make the chess team because of my height

Quote.Author: Woody Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: Life doesn't imitate art, it imitates bad television

Quote.Author: Woody Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: My one regret in life is that I am not someone else

Quote.Author: Woody Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: Seventy percent of success in life is showing up

Quote.Author: Woody Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: The talent for being happy is appreciating and liking what you have, instead of what you don't have

Quote.Author: Woody Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not afraid to die, I just don't want to be there when it happens

Quote.Author: Woody Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: What if nothing exists and we're all in somebody's dream?

Quote.Author: Woody Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: Bisexuality immediately doubles your chances for a date on Saturday night

Quote.Author: Woody Allen
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're not failing every now and again, it's a sign you're not doing anything very innovative

Quote.Author: A. A. Milne
Quote.QuoteValue: Weeds are flowers too, once you get to know them

Quote.Author: A. A. Milne
Quote.QuoteValue: Organizing is what you do before you do something, so that when you do it, it is not all mixed up

Quote.Author: A. A. Milne
Quote.QuoteValue: Golf is so popular simply because it is the best game in the world at which to be bad

Quote.Author: A. A. Milne
Quote.QuoteValue: Did you ever stop to think, and forget to start again?

Quote.Author: A. A. Milne
Quote.QuoteValue: What I say is that, if a fellow really likes potatoes, he must be a pretty decent sort of fellow

Quote.Author: A. A. Milne
Quote.QuoteValue: My spelling is Wobbly. It's good spelling but it Wobbles, and the letters get in the wrong places

Quote.Author: A. A. Milne
Quote.QuoteValue: To the uneducated, an A is just three sticks

Quote.Author: A. A. Milne
Quote.QuoteValue: You will be better advised to watch what we do instead of what we say

Quote.Author: A. A. Milne
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people care too much. I think it's called love

Quote.Author: A. A. Milne
Quote.QuoteValue: Never forget me, because if I thought you would, I'd never leave

Quote.Author: A. J. McLean
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is love, love is music, music is life, and I love my life. Thank you and good night

Quote.Author: A. J. McLean
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep your head up and be patient

Quote.Author: A. J. McLean
Quote.QuoteValue: But people who really know me, know that I am not a bad boy at heart... I am a big teddy bear

Quote.Author: A. J. McLean
Quote.QuoteValue: I pray to God I get inside a girl's head one day and see what in the WORLD they are thinking

Quote.Author: A. J. McLean
Quote.QuoteValue: I look good. I feel good and not to sound conceited I sound great

Quote.Author: A. J. McLean
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the type of guy who likes to be there 24-7. I'm Mr. Roses

Quote.Author: A. J. McLean
Quote.QuoteValue: Be very, very patient and very open-minded, and listen to what people have to say

Quote.Author: A. J. McLean
Quote.QuoteValue: Once I went to bed in Orlando and I woke up in Atlanta. I have no idea how that happened

Quote.Author: A. J. McLean
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone always says, 'When you look at a boy band, one of them has to be gay.' No, they don't

Quote.Author: A. J. McLean
Quote.QuoteValue: I've worn a dress at my wedding. I've worn 6-inch Louboutins. I've got no fear and no shame

Quote.Author: Aaliyah
Quote.QuoteValue: I see myself as sexy. If you are comfortable with it, it can be very classy and appealing

Quote.Author: Aaliyah
Quote.QuoteValue: There are times in my life when I just want to be by myself

Quote.Author: Aaliyah
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to say what I want my legacy to be when I'm long gone

Quote.Author: Aaliyah
Quote.QuoteValue: All I can do is leave it in God's hands and hope that my fans feel where I'm coming from

Quote.Author: Aaliyah
Quote.QuoteValue: Romeo Must Die came at the right time. It was the right vehicle for me

Quote.Author: Aaliyah
Quote.QuoteValue: There are times I can't even figure myself out

Quote.Author: Aaliyah
Quote.QuoteValue: It was always part of the plan to move into acting

Quote.Author: Aaliyah
Quote.QuoteValue: I want people to remember me as a full on entertainer and a good person

Quote.Author: Aaliyah
Quote.QuoteValue: There are certain things I want to keep to me. I don't discuss my private life

Quote.Author: Aaliyah
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep working hard and you can get anything that you want

Quote.Author: Aaron Neville
Quote.QuoteValue: Be honest, be nice, be a flower not a weed

Quote.Author: Aaron Neville
Quote.QuoteValue: It's up to God to do the judging. You haven't walked in my boots, so how are you going to judge me?

Quote.Author: Aaron Neville
Quote.QuoteValue: Every morning I wake up and thank God

Quote.Author: Aaron Neville
Quote.QuoteValue: I think things happened the way they did for a reason

Quote.Author: Aaron Neville
Quote.QuoteValue: I was raised Catholic, but my father's people were Methodist, so we went to both churches

Quote.Author: Aaron Neville
Quote.QuoteValue: I sing around the house, in the shower

Quote.Author: Aaron Neville
Quote.QuoteValue: I always tell people I want to see the world through His eyes, and I want people to see Him in me

Quote.Author: Aaron Neville
Quote.QuoteValue: I always loved Sam Cooke, because he seemed very versatile. He sang gospel, soul, blues, pop music

Quote.Author: Aaron Neville
Quote.QuoteValue: My friends and I were wild and we liked to joy-ride

Quote.Author: Aaron Neville
Quote.QuoteValue: When you were a kid, a day was a long time and a year was a long time

Quote.Author: Aaron Sorkin
Quote.QuoteValue: Decisions are made by those who show up

Quote.Author: Aaron Sorkin
Quote.QuoteValue: Good writers borrow from other writers. Great writers steal from them outright

Quote.Author: Aaron Sorkin
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a combination of life being unpredictable, and you being super dumb

Quote.Author: Aaron Sorkin
Quote.QuoteValue: I think socializing on the Internet is to socializing what reality TV is to reality

Quote.Author: Aaron Sorkin
Quote.QuoteValue: I like writing idealistically, romantically and swashbucklingly

Quote.Author: Aaron Sorkin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm neither a millennial nor a hipster

Quote.Author: Aaron Sorkin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not sophisticated when it comes to politics, when it comes to journalism

Quote.Author: Aaron Sorkin
Quote.QuoteValue: Whether it's 'The West Wing' or anything else, my first thought is always, 'What's a good story?'

Quote.Author: Aaron Sorkin
Quote.QuoteValue: And my friends, you ain't seen nothin' yet

Quote.Author: Aaron Sorkin
Quote.QuoteValue: I consider plot a necessary intrusion on what I really want to do, which is write snappy dialogue

Quote.Author: Abbie Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: Sacred cows make the tastiest hamburger

Quote.Author: Abbie Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: Avoid all needle drugs, the only dope worth shooting is Richard Nixon

Quote.Author: Abbie Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: A modern revolutionary group heads for the television station

Quote.Author: Abbie Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: The first duty of a revolutionary is to get away with it

Quote.Author: Abbie Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: I was probably the only revolutionary referred to as cute

Quote.Author: Abbie Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you get the right image the details aren't that important

Quote.Author: Abbie Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: Structure is more important than content in the transmission of information

Quote.Author: Abbie Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: The only way to support a revolution is to make your own

Quote.Author: Abbie Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: Never impose your language on people you wish to reach

Quote.Author: Abbie Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: Free speech means the right to shout 'theatre' in a crowded fire

Quote.Author: Abel Ferrara
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the thing about making a movie: You never finish editing. They just take it away from you

Quote.Author: Abel Ferrara
Quote.QuoteValue: As barbaric is we are, it's a miracle we haven't blown ourselves off the face of the earth so far

Quote.Author: Abel Ferrara
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is what happens when you're doing other things, right?

Quote.Author: Abel Ferrara
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have a problem with Werner Herzog

Quote.Author: Abel Ferrara
Quote.QuoteValue: Making money is not gonna change anything about what I am, except I won't answer the door

Quote.Author: Abel Ferrara
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm about my characters

Quote.Author: Abel Ferrara
Quote.QuoteValue: Most filmmaking is about shaking hands and just starting

Quote.Author: Abel Ferrara
Quote.QuoteValue: Listen, anybody who has a film festival has the right to show what they want

Quote.Author: Abel Ferrara
Quote.QuoteValue: A script is not a piece of literature it's a process

Quote.Author: Abel Ferrara
Quote.QuoteValue: My life is proof that I don't need you to do what I do. If there's no one to see it, I'll watch it

Quote.Author: Abraham Maslow
Quote.QuoteValue: What is necessary to change a person is to change his awareness of himself

Quote.Author: Abraham Maslow
Quote.QuoteValue: If you only have a hammer, you tend to see every problem as a nail

Quote.Author: Abraham Maslow
Quote.QuoteValue: The ability to be in the present moment is a major component of mental wellness

Quote.Author: Abraham Maslow
Quote.QuoteValue: What a man can be, he must be. This need we call self-actualization

Quote.Author: Abraham Maslow
Quote.QuoteValue: The story of the human race is the story of men and women selling themselves short

Quote.Author: Abraham Maslow
Quote.QuoteValue: Dispassionate objectivity is itself a passion, for the real and for the truth

Quote.Author: Abraham Maslow
Quote.QuoteValue: Education can become a self-fulfilling activity, liberating in and of itself

Quote.Author: Abraham Maslow
Quote.QuoteValue: We may define therapy as a search for value

Quote.Author: Abraham Maslow
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a full human being is difficult, frightening, and problematical

Quote.Author: Abraham Maslow
Quote.QuoteValue: A first-rate soup is more creative than a second-rate painting

Quote.Author: Abu Bakr
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest truth is honesty, and the greatest falsehood is dishonesty

Quote.Author: Abu Bakr
Quote.QuoteValue: The more knowledge you have, the greater will be your fear of Allah

Quote.Author: Abu Bakr
Quote.QuoteValue: Allah will help him who moves in the way of Allah

Quote.Author: Abu Bakr
Quote.QuoteValue: To fight against the infidels is Jihad; but to fight against your evil self is greater Jihad

Quote.Author: Abu Bakr
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not follow vain desires; for verily he who prospers is preserved from lust, greed and anger

Quote.Author: Abu Bakr
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a matter of shame that in the morning the birds should be awake earlier than you

Quote.Author: Abu Bakr
Quote.QuoteValue: God blesses him who helps his brother

Quote.Author: Abu Bakr
Quote.QuoteValue: Cursed is the man who dies, but the evil done by him survives

Quote.Author: Abu Bakr
Quote.QuoteValue: When you advise any person you should be guided by the fear of God

Quote.Author: Abu Bakr
Quote.QuoteValue: The people who abandon Jihad fall a victim to humility and degradation

Quote.Author: Action Bronson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm into heavy duty, psychedelic, foreign music. That's what I like listening to

Quote.Author: Action Bronson
Quote.QuoteValue: I live in the moment, and I reflect later

Quote.Author: Action Bronson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't put people down. I build people up. That's how I always wanna be looked at

Quote.Author: Action Bronson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not just a normal guy. I'm a gymnast

Quote.Author: Action Bronson
Quote.QuoteValue: Albanians, we tan well! I don't burn; I bake

Quote.Author: Action Bronson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm rap's vigilante. I'm out for justice

Quote.Author: Action Bronson
Quote.QuoteValue: I pick and choose my battles, but I overthink everything because I have to think about everything

Quote.Author: Action Bronson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't wanna be preached to. Unless it's in a beautiful voice, I don't want that

Quote.Author: Action Bronson
Quote.QuoteValue: As far as rap, I was more of a Mobb Deep guy rather than a Tribe guy

Quote.Author: Action Bronson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really do playlists. I don't know how to make a playlist, honestly

Quote.Author: Adam Ant
Quote.QuoteValue: Achievement results from work realizing ambition

Quote.Author: Adam Ant
Quote.QuoteValue: I just think, certainly for live music it should look as good as it sounds

Quote.Author: Adam Ant
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm blind without my glasses

Quote.Author: Adam Ant
Quote.QuoteValue: I have loved eight women in my life. I remember every woman's face

Quote.Author: Adam Ant
Quote.QuoteValue: I like being infamous. I think it is safe being a cult

Quote.Author: Adam Ant
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to do a make-up line for men

Quote.Author: Adam Ant
Quote.QuoteValue: Men look like pandas when they try and put make-up on

Quote.Author: Adam Ant
Quote.QuoteValue: If you make a mistake, you should enjoy it

Quote.Author: Adam Ant
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, style is consistency

Quote.Author: Adam Ant
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a punk rocker. I don't do Christian

Quote.Author: Adam Carolla
Quote.QuoteValue: My first car was a motorcycle

Quote.Author: Adam Carolla
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, guys are better at mechanical stuff and women are better at emotional stuff

Quote.Author: Adam Carolla
Quote.QuoteValue: Of course on air I use occasional hyperbole to tell a story

Quote.Author: Adam Carolla
Quote.QuoteValue: It's funny when you're a kid how you can acclimate to almost anything

Quote.Author: Adam Carolla
Quote.QuoteValue: I like radio and live performing stuff. I don't like the television stuff as much

Quote.Author: Adam Carolla
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a good cue card reader

Quote.Author: Adam Carolla
Quote.QuoteValue: I get depressed at airports

Quote.Author: Adam Carolla
Quote.QuoteValue: The main thing that I learned from my horrible job experiences was how horrible they were

Quote.Author: Adam Carolla
Quote.QuoteValue: Honestly, I've always had difficulty relaxing, unwinding and going to bed - that kind of stuff

Quote.Author: Adam Carolla
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always boxed, I always taught boxing

Quote.Author: Adam Driver
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to kill that father-son bond

Quote.Author: Adam Driver
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't feel like I have to dress up to go to the deli

Quote.Author: Adam Driver
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a control problem. I hate the feeling of not being in control

Quote.Author: Adam Driver
Quote.QuoteValue: Through theater and acting school, I found a way to articulate myself

Quote.Author: Adam Driver
Quote.QuoteValue: Even on your hiatus, you feel like you need to keep the character in the back of your brain

Quote.Author: Adam Driver
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not such a big fan of having a linear answer to things

Quote.Author: Adam Driver
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm like a sight gag

Quote.Author: Adam Driver
Quote.QuoteValue: Interesting things always come from being really exhausted and really sick

Quote.Author: Adam Driver
Quote.QuoteValue: In the Marine Corps, everything had a purpose

Quote.Author: Adam Driver
Quote.QuoteValue: When you get out of the Marine Corps, you feel like you can do anything

Quote.Author: Adam Lambert
Quote.QuoteValue: I am gay, and I'm very comfortable with it

Quote.Author: Adam Lambert
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm proud of my sexuality. I embrace it. It's just another part of me

Quote.Author: Adam Lambert
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm trying to be a singer, not a civil rights leader

Quote.Author: Adam Lambert
Quote.QuoteValue: Wait a minute, I'm a fan of yours; you can't be a fan of mine!

Quote.Author: Adam Lambert
Quote.QuoteValue: All these songs honestly explore the ups and downs of my reality

Quote.Author: Adam Lambert
Quote.QuoteValue: I am who I am

Quote.Author: Adam Lambert
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to get real pretty

Quote.Author: Adam Lambert
Quote.QuoteValue: At least I can say that I'm honest

Quote.Author: Adam Lambert
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a babysitter

Quote.Author: Adam Lambert
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no regrets for me

Quote.Author: Adam Peaty
Quote.QuoteValue: Biceps for show, triceps for go

Quote.Author: Adam Peaty
Quote.QuoteValue: You can easily say, 'I can go 56', but how are you going to do that?

Quote.Author: Adam Peaty
Quote.QuoteValue: Your barber always knows everything that goes on in the town, doesn't he?

Quote.Author: Adam Peaty
Quote.QuoteValue: The more you believe in yourself, the faster you're going to get

Quote.Author: Adam Peaty
Quote.QuoteValue: Every day I try to push the boundaries, and it's paid off

Quote.Author: Adam Peaty
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy racing because I want to do it. No one's forcing me

Quote.Author: Adam Peaty
Quote.QuoteValue: Ever since I was a kid, I've wanted to set a time that nobody can touch for many years

Quote.Author: Adam Peaty
Quote.QuoteValue: Seeing that flag means so much: I am inspired by my Queen, my country

Quote.Author: Adam Peaty
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a very thin line between confidence and arrogance

Quote.Author: Adam Peaty
Quote.QuoteValue: I still like to sit in a room and play games all day, so I'm a kid, really

Quote.Author: Adam Sandler
Quote.QuoteValue: My comedy is different every time I do it. I don't know what the hell I'm doing

Quote.Author: Adam Sandler
Quote.QuoteValue: I still get very scared when I step in front of a live audience

Quote.Author: Adam Sandler
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of the stuff I do on the show comes out of me just trying to make my friends laugh

Quote.Author: Adam Sandler
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, we're living in a material world, and I'm a material girl... or boy

Quote.Author: Adam Sandler
Quote.QuoteValue: Sir one more comment like that and I will strangle you with my microphone wire!

Quote.Author: Adam Sandler
Quote.QuoteValue: With the amount of money I have, it's difficult raising children the way I was raised

Quote.Author: Adam Sandler
Quote.QuoteValue: Now that I'm a parent, I understand why my father was in a bad mood a lot

Quote.Author: Adam Sandler
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll continue to make the typical Adam Sandler comedies

Quote.Author: Adam Sandler
Quote.QuoteValue: In high school I wanted to be a rock star and was in a lot of bands

Quote.Author: Adam Sandler
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up cursing a lot. It felt natural. My parents told me to stop

Quote.Author: Adam Savage
Quote.QuoteValue: Failure is always an option

Quote.Author: Adam Savage
Quote.QuoteValue: I reject your reality and substitute my own

Quote.Author: Adam Savage
Quote.QuoteValue: Bigger is always better

Quote.Author: Adam Savage
Quote.QuoteValue: I am now standing in a mixture of cooling fluid, gasoline, and cola

Quote.Author: Adam Savage
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's blow some stuff up

Quote.Author: Adam Savage
Quote.QuoteValue: Remember kids, I have life insurance

Quote.Author: Adam Savage
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the show. it's like 5 minutes of science and then 10 minutes of me hurting myself
